text: @SupraDarky Yeah, definitely not your fault. I played this game a lot years ago and don't remember ever hearing some of the themes (probably because I really only used 1 or 2 characters). Thanks again for all the variety. I'm going to have to go play this one again really soon.

author: thecookchef

text:
Okay, this is kind of a stretch, but from 0:57 to 1:01 I got this huge vibe of familiarity; for a while I couldn't place it, but ultimately I realized it oddly reminded me of (even though it's clearly not overly similar to) a part of the song Time's Scar from Chrono Chross.

Listen to that part and then to Time's Scar, and you'll eventually hear the part I'm talking about, maybe?

Or maybe I've just been listening to SupraDarky's playlists waaaaaay too much....
author: Christopher Young

text: Once I saw the words "Very Hard" I knew I'd never unlock him.  Lol.
author: NYCrazyRob

text: No wonder I never heard that track before. Thanks for the info! ;)
author: sonideromex

text: Spade was a hidden character, unlockable only after beating a certain story mode chapter on Very Hard then buying him in the shop. Maybe you didn't unlock him?
author: Babybahamut

text: This track is great. I like it alot. I have F-Zero GX but I don't remember this song being in that game. How could I have missed it?
author: sonideromex

text: GXs music was great, but I liked X's better. It was more metal rather than techno.
author: lazyman556

text: Minus the flute part towards the end, it sounds like music from the PC game Tyrian.
author: NYCrazyRob

text: It's definitely not intentional, it probably has to do with the fact that you hear the battle/level themes a lot more, which in turn makes you remember them more, nostalgia and all. Series like FF have great character themes though.
author: SupraDarky

text: Ahh, love this one, Spade is one of the more interesting characters. It's a shame none of them are ever fleshed out- even Captain Falcon is quite flat. I'd love the next big F-Zero release to go into more depth.
author: Babybahamut

text: OMG I love this song! You should post more F-Zero GX Themes, More specifically Phoenix's Theme.
